# A Tweedie GLMM standardization model

---

## A Tweedie GLMM standardization model

$$
\begin{align}
  y_i &\sim \mathrm{Tweedie}(\mu_i, p, \phi), \quad 1 < p < 2,\\
  \mu_i &= \exp \left(
  \mathbf{X}_i \mathbf{\beta} + \alpha^\mathrm{locality}_{j[i]} + \alpha^\mathrm{locality-year}_{k[i]} + \alpha^\mathrm{vessel}_{l[i]} \right)
  \\
\end{align}
$$
